definition: fears of trouble in the rear (idiom); family worries (obstructing freedom of action)/worries about the future consequences/often in negative expressions, meaning "no worries about anything"
back/behind/rear/afterwards/after/later/post-
surname Gu
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
(possessive particle, literary equivalent of 的[de5])/him/her/it
to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning

sentences.english: There are complete facilities and perfect services, assist you to resolve problems in your business.
sentences.chinese: 設施完善，服務周到，定讓您的商務之事無後顧之憂。

sentences.english: Our sales and service system throughout the country, so you worry-free .
sentences.chinese: 我們的銷售以及服務體系遍及全國，使您無後顧之憂。

sentences.english: Its Spare Part Department has a variety of generating set parts on hand to settle user's troubles back at home.
sentences.chinese: 配件部常備各型發電機組配件，爲用戶解決後顧之憂。

sentences.english: It's both a clincher and it overcomes reluctance' to buy.
sentences.chinese: 這既是個決定性因素，也解決了人們買車的後顧之憂。

sentences.english: Timely perfect sales and after-sales service, will exempt your extra worries.
sentences.chinese: 完善及時的售後支持，解決您的後顧之憂。

sentences.english: So what would you do if you had all the security in the world?
sentences.chinese: 所以如果你沒有後顧之憂的話你想做什麼呢？

sentences.english: ECMC products to worry about the customer.
sentences.chinese: ECMC產品的客戶的後顧之憂。

sentences.english: High quality plus circumspect after-sales service and technology supporting could make you rest easy.
sentences.chinese: 優質周到的售後服務及技術支持使您無後顧之憂。

sentences.english: We are improving after-sales service to ensure that users worry-free .
sentences.chinese: 我們有完善的售後服務以保證用戶無後顧之憂。

sentences.english: Make your choice of Jia Yi nothing to worry about.
sentences.chinese: 使您對藝嘉的選擇毫無後顧之憂。

sentences.english: Accurate matching with small gap, easy maintenance with no worries.
sentences.chinese: 配合準隙小，維護方便，沒有後顧之憂。

definition: to sleep peacefully (idiom)/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries
civil society
ability to make one's own decisions
fair competition

(Tw) to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
social activity
to get out of trouble/to escape from danger/a danger appears/threatened by danger
to be at the highest level of enlightenment (Buddhist expression)
guarantor/bailor
to investigate and plan forward
extremely rare (idiom)/once in a blue moon
to yield to one another/mutual accommodation
to recover/to recuperate
to spare no effort
Quality of Service/QOS
